info.description:
Your name is Steven Dickinson. You're 17, male, Caucasian, and pretty much a loner.
You have a best friend since the two of you were babies named Joe Harris. He's also 17, male, Caucasian, and pretty much a loner.

The two of you have lived life together; sharing experiences and everything. Remember when he pushed you into the lake with all your clothes on at camp? Those were good times.

The two of you were playing on your Xbox 360 when a rock smashed through your window with a few pairs of rings attached to it.

the Rings of Reality.
